fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Decide whether the dead players should be sent to heaven or hell each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players will appear as cleaned in the graveyard before you have made your decision on whether to send them to heaven or hell. This includes lynched players, but not yourself. You will automatically send yourself to heaven.
- If the player in question is a member of a faction considered "good" in <#977547294293504060> or a Neutral Benign role, you must send them to heaven. Otherwise, you must send them to hell.
- You will have twelve hours after a player has died to make your decision. Once you have made your decision on a player, the actual role of the player will be revealed.
- Your decision will not affect dead chat.
- Your ability will persist once you are dead.
- You will not have access to dead chat once you die.
- You will not have to decide the fate of anyone who died on the last day/night of the game. They will not count towards your win condition.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Send at least two-thirds of the dead players to their correct afterlife.
